description.plain: R&B lovetrain Trey Songz, born Tremaine Neverson, is an American singer, rapper and actor. Born in Petersburg, Virginia, he rose to fame after releasing his third studio album Ready. From then on, he’s become a household name frequently topping charts with songs like “Bottom’s Up” and “Say Aah”.

body.plain: R&B lovetrain Trey Songz, born Tremaine Neverson, is an American singer, rapper and actor. Born in Petersburg, Virginia, he rose to fame after releasing his third studio album Ready. From then on, he’s become a household name frequently topping charts with songs like “Bottom’s Up” and “Say Aah”.

songs.full_title: Bottoms Up by Trey Songz (Ft. Nicki Minaj)
songs.title: Bottoms Up

description.plain: Club song, produced by Kane Beats, who’s known for producing club style beats (generally with some type of brass) for Lil Wayne. Nicki Minaj graces the song with a rap verse, which is ended with a dedication to Anna Nicole Smith, who died of a drug overdose

songs.full_title: Touchin, Lovin by Trey Songz (Ft. Nicki Minaj)
songs.title: Touchin, Lovin

description.plain:
“Touchin, Lovin”, featuring rapper Nicki Minaj, appears as track 4 on Trey Songz sixth album “Trigga” available on July 1, 2014. It was released streaming on June 24th, along with the full album on MTV’s website (http://www.mtv.com/artists/trey-songz/)

This is Nicki Minaj’s first feature with Trey Songz since their chart-topping collaboration “Bottoms Up” in 2010.

The song interpolates “Fuck You Tonight”, written by The Notorious B.I.G, Daron Jones, Sean Combs and R. Kelly.

songs.embed_content: Read “Touchin, Lovin” by Trey Songz on Genius

body.plain:
“Touchin, Lovin”, featuring rapper Nicki Minaj, appears as track 4 on Trey Songz sixth album “Trigga” available on July 1, 2014. It was released streaming on June 24th, along with the full album on MTV’s website (http://www.mtv.com/artists/trey-songz/)

This is Nicki Minaj’s first feature with Trey Songz since their chart-topping collaboration “Bottoms Up” in 2010.

The song interpolates “Fuck You Tonight”, written by The Notorious B.I.G, Daron Jones, Sean Combs and R. Kelly.
